thread.title: Study shows links between major weather events (Loughborough University)

author: wn.com
title: Study shows links between major weather events (Loughborough University)
text: ( Source : Loughborough University ) 20Oct2015 Study shows links between major weather events New research has found the UK's most costly weather events are very likely linked rather than independent as previously thought. Dr John Hillier,
